cleaned_text: The Heart of Healing - Weekend Retreat Based on Modern Interpretation of Sufi Healing Philosophy May 16, 2014 at 7:30pm to May 18, 2014 at 12:00pm Location: Abode of the Message, New Lebanon, NY - 45min from Albany Airport In this enlivening retreat, we'll explore how to use the practical language of cutting-edge scientific research to integrate the timeless techniques of authentic spiritual practice into our healing relationships. The program will include a combination of didactic and experiential dialog and provide skills, tools and language for self-care and to use in clinical practice. Masterfully led by three expert teachers—a physician, a clinical nurse educator and a senior international teacher in spiritual dimensions of healing—enjoy this wonderful opportunity to learn and relax at a tranquil Shaker campus near the Berkshires, complete with delicious, organic meals and beautiful natural surroundings. Tuition is $345,
